fullplot: Jacob is a young man used to getting everything he wants. For several years, he has been living in a happy homosexual partnership with Jèrgen, and one night Jacob decides to pop the big question to Jèrgen. Jèrgen happily accepts Jacobs marriage proposal, but then something happens: Jacob falls in love with a girl, and not just any girl. The girl is Caroline, married to Jèrgens younger brother Tom. Jacob's life suddenly gets very complicated, trying to figure out whether he wants to spend his life with Jèrgen or Caroline. Most of all, he wants both! When Caroline gets pregnant with Jacob, matters are even more complicated.

title: Shake It
